text: Andinosaura aurea is a species of lizard in the family Gymnophthalmidae. It is endemic to Ecuador. ==References== Category:Andinosaura Category:Reptiles of Ecuador Category:Endemic fauna of Ecuador Category:Reptiles described in 2012 Category:Taxa named by Santiago J. Sánchez-Pacheco Category:Taxa named by Vanessa Aguirre-Peñafiel Category:Taxa named by Omar Torres-Carvajal
title: Andinosaura aurea
